Michigan’s Citizens
Governor Jennifer M. Granholm

The American Recovery and Reinvestment Act (ARRA) of 2009
The American Recovery and
Reinvestment Act (ARRA) of 2009

• President Obama signs the Recovery Act on February 17, 2009
